latest.release_notes:
See the [CHANGELOG](https://github.com/Nolyo/voice-tool/blob/v-2.1.0/CHANGELOG.md) for details.

## Downloads

- **voice-tool-v-2.1.0-portable.exe** : Portable version (no installation required)
- **voice-tool-v-2.1.0-setup.exe** : NSIS installer (recommended)
- **voice-tool-v-2.1.0-setup.msi** : MSI installer (Windows Installer)

Verify file integrity using the provided SHA256 checksums.

## Auto-Update Support

This release includes signed update artifacts for automatic in-app updates.
